from: Where do you want to depart from?
What is the origin of your trip?

to: Where do you want to go?
What is the destination of your trip?
by: What kind of transportation do you want to use?
Which means of transportation do you prefer?
How do you want to reach your destination?
Please let me know what kind of transport you want.

class: Should I book first, business or economy class?

What kind of class do you wish?
when: When do you wish to start your journey?
